import { Fragment } from 'react' import { Menu, Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import { ChevronDownIcon } from '@heroicons/react/20/solid' function classNames(...classes) { return classes.filter(Boolean).join(' ') } export default function Userbar() { let user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('userAuth')) return (
{user.Firstname} {user.Lastname}
{({ active }) => ( Account settings )} {({ active }) => ( Support )} {({ active }) => ( License )}
{({ active }) => ( )}
) }
